mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(username, password, user_email, user_phone_number, user_address, user_pic_url, nickName, user_division, created_at, gender_id, age_id, kakao_login) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userAddress}, #{userPicUrl}, #{nickName}, #{userDivision}, now(), #{genderId}, #{ageId}, #{kakaoLogin});
mapper.select: select * from user_tb u left join point_tb p on u.id = p.user_id order by u.id asc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select * from user_tb u join team_tb t on u.team_id = t.id join sport_tb s on t.sport_id = s.id where u.id = #{id}
select * from user_tb u left join point_tb p on u.id = p.user_id where u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.nickname, u.user_email, u.user_address, u.user_division, t.team_name, t.team_introduce, t.level, t.team_location, sp.sport_name, rt.reservation_date, rt.start_time, rt.end_time, rt.status, s.space_name FROM user_tb u LEFT JOIN team_tb t ON u.team_id = t.id LEFT JOIN sport_tb sp ON sp.id = t.sport_id LEFT JOIN reservation_tb rt ON rt.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN space_tb s ON s.id = rt.space_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
select * from user_tb u left join point_tb p on u.id = p.user_id where u.username like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and u.user_division = #{division}
select * from user_tb u left join point_tb p on u.id = p.user_id where u.user_email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and u.user_division = #{division}

select * from user_tb u left join point_tb p on u.id = p.user_id
where u.user_phone_number like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and u.user_division = #{division}
select * from user_tb u left join point_tb p on u.id = p.user_id where u.nickname like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and u.user_division = #{division}
SELECT * FROM USER_TB AS u JOIN AGE_TB AS a ON a.ID = u.AGE_ID JOIN GENDER_TB AS g ON g.ID = u.GENDER_ID where u.id = #{id};
